day1.breakfast: Greek yogurt with mixed berries and a sprinkle of granola
day1.lunch: Quinoa salad with chickpeas, cucumber, and lemon dressing
day1.dinner: Grilled chicken breast with steamed broccoli and brown rice

day2.breakfast: Smoothie with spinach, banana, and protein powder
day2.lunch: Turkey and avocado wrap with whole grain tortilla
day2.dinner: Baked salmon with asparagus and sweet potato

day3.breakfast: Oatmeal topped with sliced banana and honey
day3.lunch: Lentil soup with a side of whole grain bread
day3.dinner: Stir-fried tofu with mixed vegetables and quinoa

day4.breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and whole grain toast
day4.lunch: Chicken Caesar salad with light dressing
day4.dinner: Pasta with marinara sauce and grilled vegetables

day5.breakfast: Chia seed pudding with almond milk and berries
day5.lunch: Tuna salad with mixed greens and balsamic vinaigrette
day5.dinner: Beef stir-fry with bell peppers and brown rice

day6.breakfast: Whole grain pancakes with maple syrup and strawberries
day6.lunch: Vegetable wrap with hummus and spinach
day6.dinner: Grilled shrimp with quinoa and steamed green beans

day7.breakfast: Smoothie bowl with banana, spinach, and topped with nuts
day7.lunch: Quinoa and black bean salad with avocado
day7.dinner: Baked chicken thighs with roasted Brussels sprouts and carrots

plan.explanation: Balanced meals focusing on lean proteins, whole grains, and plenty of fruits and vegetables to support overall health.
plan.disclaimer: This is general nutrition guidance, not medical advice.

plan.explanation: A balanced approach alternating strength training and cardio, with active recovery and rest.
plan.disclaimer: Consult a professional before starting a new exercise program.
